AUTH_UPDATE_ACTION: Click here to log back in
CONNECTION_ERROR: Kesalahan koneksi: silahkan periksa server URL
CONNECTION_UNKNOWN: Terjadi kesalahan yang tidak diketahui saat mencoba menghubungkan
CREATE_REPORT: Klik untuk menghasilkan sebuah laporan kesalahan
DELETE_READONLY_DOCUMENT: Mark "%1" filtered as it is in read-only mode
DELETION_BEHAVIOR_CHANGE_SETTINGS_DESCR: Define what is happening on the server when you delete documents locally (If you choose to delete on the server, you can find the document in the server trash).
DELETION_BEHAVIOR_CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want to delete %1 for all users?
DELETION_BEHAVIOR_CONFIRM_UNSYNC:
Do you really want to remove %1?
It will be unsynchronized from your device, but other members will still have access.
You can change the deletion behavior in the settings. To synchronize it again, you need to check it in the filters window by clicking on %2 in the settings.
DELETION_BEHAVIOR_SWITCH:
Would you like to unsynchronize documents by default?
You can change this option in the settings window.
DIRECT_EDIT_CANT_FIND_ENGINE: User %1 on server %2 is not signed in %3 on this computer.
DIRECT_EDIT_CONFLICT_MESSAGE: The document "%1" was modified remotely and is now in conflict. What do you want to do?
DIRECT_EDIT_CORRUPTED_DOWNLOAD_FAILURE: Direct Edit failed because of corrupted content, please contact your administrator
DIRECT_EDIT_AUTH_EXPIRED:
Kredensial tidak sah untuk pengguna %1 di server %2.

Silakan masuk ke Pengaturan dan masukkan informasi yang benar.
DIRECT_EDIT_FORBIDDEN_MSG: Access to the document "%1" on %2 is forbidden for user %3.
DIRECT_EDIT_LOCKED_FILE: Cannot edit "%1" as it was locked by %2 on %3
DIRECT_EDIT_NOT_ENABLED: The Direct Edit feature is not enabled.
DIRECT_EDIT_NOT_POSSIBLE:
The Direct Edit feature is not usable right now.
Please try again later.
DIRECT_EDIT_PROXY: You are trying to perform a Direct Edit on "%1". This is a proxy so it cannot be edited.
DIRECT_EDIT_READONLY_FILE: Cannot edit "%1" as it is read-only
DIRECT_EDIT_VERSION: You are trying to perform a Direct Edit on version %1 of "%2". It is not the current version of the document, so it is readonly and cannot be edited.
DIRECT_TRANSFER_CANCEL: Do you confirm the cancellation of the transfer of "%1"?
DIRECT_TRANSFER_CANCEL_HEADER: A transfer cancellation has been asked.
DIRECT_TRANSFER_NO_ACCOUNT: Cannot use the Direct Transfer feature with no account, aborting.
DIRECT_TRANSFER_NOT_ALLOWED: Direct Transfer of "%1" is not allowed for synced files.
DIRECT_TRANSFER_NOT_ENABLED: The Direct Transfer feature is not enabled.
DIRECT_TRANSFER_NOT_POSSIBLE:
The Direct Transfer feature is not usable right now.
Please try again later.
DRIVE_ROOT_DELETED: The synchronization folder "%1" of %2 has been deleted. Would you like to disconnect from the server or do you want to recreate it?
DRIVE_ROOT_DELETED_HEADER: Deletion of the synchronization folder detected.
DRIVE_ROOT_MOVED: The synchronization folder "%1" of %2 has been moved to "%3". Would you like to update the synchronization location, recreate the folder or disconnect?
DUPLICATE_BEHAVIOR_TOOLTIP: Select the way duplicates are handled, read the documentation for more information.
ENGINE_BETA: Anda telah mengonfigurasi mesin beta. Anda dapat mengalami beberapa masalah dan kami menghargai masukan anda.
ERROR_REASON_READONLY: Dokumen tidak bisa diunggah di server karena itu atau induknya hanya bisa dibaca.
ERROR_REASON_DEDUP: Sebuah dokumen remote dengan nama yang sama ada, tapi saudara dilarang. Entah menghubungi kontributor untuk mengubah nama dokumen atau mengubah nama lokal anda dan coba lagi.
ERROR_REASON_CORRUPT: Gagal mengunduh berkas karena kami tidak dapat memverifikasi keutuhannya. Entah berkas remote memiliki jumlah cek yang buruk dan sysadmin harus menjaganya, anda harus mencoba lagi unduhannya.
ERROR_REASON_NOT_FOUND: The document or its parent does not exist anymore on the server. This is an acknowledge message only because we cannot do anything about it.
ERROR_REASON_SERVER_ERROR: The server has not been able to handle the request for this document. If the error persists, try contacting your sysadmin.
ERROR_REASON_UNKNOWN: Dokumen ini adalah kesalahan untuk alasan yang tidak diketahui
ERROR_REASON_UNKNOWN_DIGEST: This document's digest doesn't fit any algorithm. Its integrity cannot be verified.
EXTRA_FILE_COUNT: … and %1 more in the last hour
FATAL_ERROR_MSG:
Ooops! Unfortunately, a fatal error occurred and %1 has stopped.
Please share the following information with %2 support: we’ll do our best to fix it!
FATAL_ERROR_UPDATE_TOOLTIP: We advise you to update to the latest version of %1
FEATURE_AUTO_UPDATE: Enable or disable the update mechanism of the application.
FEATURE_DIRECT_TRANSFER: One-time transfer of content between the Nuxeo Server and the desktop.
FEATURE_DIRECT_EDIT: Edit any of document’s content from their Summary tab even if they are not synchronized.
FEATURE_S3: Improve the speed of your uploads by leveraging the AWS infrastructure. Even enabled, this feature will be effective only for Nuxeo Cloud customers and for Nuxeo servers with S3 Direct Upload addon installed and up-to-date.
FEEDBACK_LINK: Something is missing? Share your feedback here.
FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS: There is already a file named "%1" in  this folder. Do you want to replace it with the one you're moving?
FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS_HEADER: A duplicate file has been found.
FILTERS_DISABLED: You must wait for current synchronization actions to be done before filtering some folders.
FOLDER_PERMISSION_ERROR: No enough rights to use the local folder
FOLDER_USED: Folder sudah digunakan oleh akun yang lain
IGNORE_REASON_CORRUPT: Berkas ini diabaikan karena integritasnya tidak bisa diverifikasi.
IGNORE_REASON_DEDUP: Dokumen ini diabaikan karena duplikat yang ada
IGNORE_REASON_LOCKED: Berkas ini terkunci, hal itu akan menyebabkan konflik jika berkas tersebut dimodifikasi dari jarak jauh
IGNORE_REASON_MANUAL: Berkas ini adalah kesalahan, dan telah diabaikan secara manual
IGNORE_REASON_NOT_FOUND: The document or its parent does not exist anymore on the server
IGNORE_REASON_PARENT_UNSYNC: Berkas ini diabaikan karena induknya juga diabaikan
IGNORE_REASON_READONLY: Berkas ini atau induknya hanya bisa dibaca
IGNORE_REASON_UNKNOWN: Berkas ini diabaikan untuk alasan yang tidak diketahui
INSTALL_ADDONS: Install Addons (like icon overlays) [requires administrative rights]
LOCKED_FILE: Cannot update "%1" as it was locked by %2 on %3
LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG_WARNING: Setting the level to "DEBUG" will most certainly log sensitive data in your log file. This data can be your login token, which can be used to access and interact with your account on your Nuxeo instance.
LONG_PATH_ERROR_MSG: The document "%1" cannot be processed because its filename or full path is too long.
METADATA_FILE_NOT_HANDLE: Berkas ini tidak ditangani oleh server Nuxeo atau belum disinkronkan.
MISSING_UPDATE_VERSION: Tidak ada versi yang kompatibel yang tersedia
NAME: Nama
NO_ACCOUNT: You haven't connected any account yet
NO_ACCOUNT_DESCR: Use the %1 button to connect to a Nuxeo account and start synchronizing content on your computer.
NO_ACTIVE_SESSION: There is no active session, click on New transfer to create a new one.
NO_CONFLICTS_BODY: Anda telah menyelesaikan semua konflik dan kesalahan
NO_CONFLICTS_TITLE: Tidak ada konflik atau kesalahan yang tersisa
NO_ROOTS:
There is no synchronized folder associated with your account.

Please browse to your instance and pick a folder to start synchronizing content.

Learn more about synchronization on the documentation website.
NO_SPACE_LEFT_ON_DEVICE: Tidak ada ruang yang tersisa di perangkat, bebaskan beberapa ruang disk.
PROXY_PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER: Harap masukkan kata sandi proxy anda
PROXY_USERNAME_PLACEHOLDER: Silakan masukkan nama pengguna proxy anda
READONLY_FILE: Cannot update "%1" as it is read-only
READONLY_FOLDER: "%1" could not be uploaded to read-only folder "%2"
RELEASE_NOTES_MSG: Your %1 has been correctly updated to the version %2, please read the release notes for more information.
RESTART_NEEDED_MSG: You need to restart %1 to continue using it.
ROOT_USED_WITH_OTHER_BINDING: Folder ini telah digunakan oleh %1, isinya akan dihapus. Apakah anda ingin melanjutkan? Jika tidak, klik Batal dan pilih folder lain.
ROOT_USED_WITH_OTHER_BINDING_HEADER: A folder already in use has been detected.
RUNNING_FROM_WRONG_PATH: You are running this app from "%1". However, for all features to run normally, the application must be named "%2" and located in the "/$HOME/Applications" directory.
SECTION_FEATURES_DESC: Select in one click the features to enable inside the application.
SECTION_FEATURES_BETA: <sup><font color='red'>BETA<font></sup> features are subject to frequent changes in terms of user experience and functional scope as they benefit from frequent feedback and agile development. They go through standard quality process, they do not endanger data consistency and are safe to use.
SELECTIVE_SYNC_DESCR: Select which folder you want to see on this computer. Any folders you unselect won't be shown on this computer, but you can still access them online.
SELECT_SYNC_FOLDERS_DESCRIPTION: Memungkinkan anda memilih folder yang akan disinkronkan secara lokal. Ini membutuhkan mesin untuk online.
SERVER_INCOMPATIBLE: We advise you to downgrade your %1 client to the %2 version or to contact your administrator to upgrade your Nuxeo instance.
SERVER_INCOMPATIBLE_HEADER: Your server version is not compatible with %1 %2.
SESSION_CANCEL:
Do you confirm the cancellation of the transfers session to "%1"?

%2 item(s) will be aborted.
SESSION_CANCEL_HEADER: A session cancellation has been asked.
SHARE_METRICS_ERROR_REPORTING: Allow anonymous bug reports (might include username and document paths)
SHARE_METRICS_MSG: To improve your experience, in case of crash or bug, technical reports can be shared with %1 developers and support automatically. No personal data will ever be shared.
SSL_HOSTNAME_ERROR: The host name did not match any of the valid hosts for this certificate.
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Tetapkan akun anda dan sinkronkan berkas anda dengan Platform Nuxeo.
WINDOWS_ERROR_OPENED_FILE: The file "%1" is open by another software. Please close it before %2 can process the deletion from your local storage.
WINDOWS_ERROR_OPENED_FOLDER: The folder "%1" or its children is locked by another software. Please close it before %2 can process the deletion from your local storage.
WRONG_CHANNEL: You are running version %1 which is from the "%2" channel, but your current channel is "%3". Do you want to downgrade to the latest version of your current channel, or switch channels?
